1.details:
1. Fix timeline scroll race condition with scroll queuing system
2. Add memory leak cleanup in HuggingFace service useEffect
3. Implement localStorage error handling for JSON parsing

2.content: Fix Critical Security & State Bugs (App.tsx - Part 2)
2.details:
1. Implement file upload validation (type/size/security)
2. Add state synchronization fixes to prevent data loss
3. Add runtime type validation for visual presets

3.details:
1. Sanitize error logs to prevent API key exposure
2. Add bounds checking for array access to prevent crashes
3. Implement proper error handling patterns

4.content: Fix High Priority Performance & Memory Issues
4.details:
1. Implement unbounded array limits and virtual scrolling
2. Add proper cleanup for DOM event listeners
3. Optimize infinite re-renders in visual editors with memoization

5.content: Fix Medium Priority Error Handling & Validation
5.details:
1. Wrap components with ErrorBoundary for crash prevention
2. Add comprehensive input validation across forms
3. Fix unhandled promise rejections with try-catch blocks

6.content: Fix Low Priority Code Quality Issues
6.details:
1. Replace console.log statements with proper logging
2. Extract magic numbers to named constants
3. Standardize error handling patterns throughout codebase
